en.label: Content can be targeted for experience purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes

en.label: Content can be targeted for experience purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for experience purposes

en.label: Content can be targeted for functional purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for functional purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for functional purposes

en.label: Content can be targeted for marketing purposes
en.userNotice: Determines if you can be targeted content, based on personal data, for marketing purposes
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can be targeted content, based on personal data, for marketing purposes

en.label: Allow Create Experiences
en.userNotice: Determines whether the account can access general-purpose Create experiences in Fortnite (e.g. Creative Create)

en.label: Display username to non-squad users
en.userNotice: Determines if your username can be shown to non-squad users
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child''s username can be shown to non-squad users

en.label: Can see usernames of players from other squads
en.userNotice: Determines if you can see usernames of players from other squads
en.parentNotice: Determines if your child can see usernames of players from other squads

en.label: Weekly
en.parentNotice: On: We'll send a weekly playtime report to the parent or guardian associated with this account. If there isn't a parent or guardian email address, we'll send the playtime report to this account’s email address.

en.label: Never
en.parentNotice: Off: You won't receive weekly playtime tracking reports.

en.label: Require PIN to add Epic friends
en.parentNotice: On: Each time your child tries to send or accept an Epic Games friend request, you will need to enter your PIN. If a game or service doesn't yet support this setting, friend requests won't be permitted. This setting doesn’t affect friends systems on gaming platforms such as Playstation, Steam, XBox, and Switch.

en.label: Enhanced voice chat recording
en.userNotice: Determines enhanced voice chat recording setting
en.parentNotice: Determines enhanced voice chat recording setting

en.label: Filter out mature language in Epic text chat
en.userNotice: Mature language in text chat will be filtered and replaced with heart symbols
en.parentNotice: On: Mature language in text chat will be filtered and replaced with heart symbols.

en.label: Voice chat
en.userNotice: Determines with whom you can use the text chat feature
en.parentNotice: Who can your child message with using Epic text chat?

en.label: Nobody
en.userNotice: You cannot use text chat with anybody
en.parentNotice: Epic text chat is disabled for your child.

en.label: Friends Only
en.userNotice: You can use text chat with friends only
en.parentNotice: Your child can text chat only with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list.

en.label: Friends & Teammates
en.userNotice: You can use text chat with friends and teammates
en.parentNotice: Your child can text chat with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list, and those on their team.

en.label: Everybody
en.userNotice: You can use text chat with everybody
en.parentNotice: Your child can text chat with any player.

en.label: Voice chat
en.userNotice: Determines with whom you can use the voice chat feature
en.parentNotice: Who can your child speak with using Epic voice chat?

en.label: Nobody
en.parentNotice: Epic voice chat is disabled for your child.

en.label: Friends Only
en.userNotice: You can voice chat only with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list.
en.parentNotice: Your child can voice chat only with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list.

en.label: Friends & Teammates
en.userNotice: You can voice chat with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list, and those on their team.
en.parentNotice: Your child can voice chat with players in their Epic friends list and platform friends list, and those on their team.

en.label: Everybody
en.userNotice: You can voice chat with any player.
en.parentNotice: Your child can voice chat with any player.

en.label: Enhanced voice chat recording
en.userNotice: Determines enhanced voice chat recording setting
en.parentNotice: Determines enhanced voice chat recording setting

en.label: ON
en.userNotice: When Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting is turned ON, it is available in all voice chats.
en.parentNotice: When Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting is turned ON, it is available in all voice chats.

en.label: PREFER OFF
en.userNotice: When Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting is turned to PREFER OFF, it is disabled when all players in the party channel have set enhanced voice reporting to PREFER OFF.
en.parentNotice: When Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting is turned to PREFER OFF, it is disabled when all players in the party channel have set enhanced voice reporting to PREFER OFF.

en.label: PREFER OFF & AUTOMUTE
en.userNotice: Same behaviour as PREFER OFF. Additionally, you will be auto-muted if reporting is available in your voice chat due to the preferences of other players. Note that enhanced voice chat reporting is always enabled, regardless of your settings, in game chat, proximity chat, looking for party chat, or when a party includes at least one player who has Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting turned ON. You will be notified in-game if the status of reporting changes. Only players aged 18 and older can change this setting to PREFER OFF or PREFER OFF & AUTO MUTE.
en.parentNotice: Same behaviour as PREFER OFF. Additionally, you will be auto-muted if reporting is available in your voice chat due to the preferences of other players. Note that enhanced voice chat reporting is always enabled, regardless of your settings, in game chat, proximity chat, looking for party chat, or when a party includes at least one player who has Enhanced Voice Chat Reporting turned ON. You will be notified in-game if the status of reporting changes. Only players aged 18 and older can change this setting to PREFER OFF or PREFER OFF & AUTO MUTE.
